name: Charlotte Linlin
text: If your leader has the type {Big Mom Pirates}, this Character gains Rush. On Opponent's Attack Once Per Turn DON!! -5: You may declare a cost. Reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the same cost as the declared cost, give up to 1 of your Leaders +2000 power during this turn.

effect.text: You may declare a cost. Reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the same cost as the declared cost, give up to 1 of your Leaders +2000 power during this turn.
